description.narrative: Output 3.2: More vulnerable boys and girls have equitable access to basic quality formal, non-formal or alternative learning opportunities, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, sustained quality access for girls and boys to equitable and inclusive education opportunities
